title: 126. Moving Beyond the Post-Colonial and the Mythological West with Martino Stierli
itunes:title: 126. Moving Beyond the Post-Colonial and the Mythological West with Martino Stierliv
description: This week, we talk with Martino Stierli, MOMA’s Philip Johnson Chief Curator of Architecture and Design, about MOMA’s current exhibition entitled The Project of Independence: Architectures of Decolonization in South Asia, 1947–1985.
content:encoded: This week, we talk with Martino Stierli, MOMA’s Philip Johnson Chief Curator of Architecture and Design, about MOMA’s current exhibition entitled The Project of Independence: Architectures of Decolonization in South Asia, 1947–1985.
